John E. Charles Accountant

B. Bus (Acct), Registered Tax Agent

Services

Whether you require assistance with filing and lodgement, compliance services, or planning and advising, I have a number of services and solutions on offer.

As an individual, small or medium-sized business, you have the advantage of over 30 years of experience and expertise working to design a customized program for you.

Tax return preparation and lodgement – individuals and all forms of business entities
Taxation planning, including tax advice, tax minimisation strategies and opportunities
Capital gains tax advice and planning including assistance with the generous capital gains tax small business concessions available
Division 7A compliance
Business Activity Statement (BAS) and Installment Activity Statement (IAS) preparation and lodgement – individuals and all forms of business entities
Fringe benefits tax compliance including fringe benefits tax return preparation and lodgement
Monitoring of future tax payable with preparation of interim projections and structure review
GST planning, including GST advice minimisation strategies and opportunities including application of the GST margin scheme and GST-free going concern
